original_text: This animal was once alive, but it is not alive now. Soon it will come up out of the deep hole again but then God will destroy it completely. All these things will surprise many people who live on the earth. Those are the people whose names are not written in God's book of life from the beginning of the world. They will be surprised to see the animal that was alive at one time. It is not alive now, but it will soon appear again.
korean_text: 네가 본 짐승은 전에 있었다가 지금은 없으나 장차 무저갱으로부터 올라와 멸망으로 들어갈 자니 땅에 사는 자들로서 창세 이후로 그 이름이 생명책에 기록되지 못한 자들이 이전에 있었다가 지금은 없으나 장차 나올 짐승을 보고 놀랍게 여기리라

sentences.original_text: but it is not alive now
Soon it will come up out of the deep hole again
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 이 짐승이 깊은 구멍에서 다시 올라올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but then God will destroy it completely
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그때 하나님이 그것을 완전히 파괴하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: All these things will surprise many people
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일들은 많은 사람들을 놀라게 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: whose names are not written in God's book of life
from the beginning of the world
to see the animal that was alive at one time
but it will soon appear again
